title: Graph database while computationally efficient filters out quickly the ESG integrated equities in investment management. (arXiv:2401.07483v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: Design/methodology/approach This research evaluated the databases of SQL, No-SQL and graph databases to compare and contrast efficiency and performance. To perform this experiment the data were collected from multiple sources including stock price and financial news. Python is used as an interface to connect and query databases (to create database structures according to the feed file structure, to load data into tables, objects, to read data , to connect PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, Neo4j. Purpose Modern applications of LLM (Large language model) including RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) with Machine Learning, deep learning, NLP (natural language processing) or Decision Analytics are computationally expensive. Finding a better option to consume less resources and time to get the result. Findings The Graph database of ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance) is comparatively better and can be considered for extended analytics to integrate ESG in business and investment. Practical

translated_title: 在投资管理中，计算高效的图数据库快速过滤出ESG整合的股票
translated_abstract: 本研究评估了SQL、No-SQL和图数据库的效率和性能，并比较了它们的优缺点。通过收集来自多个来源的数据，包括股票价格和财经新闻，使用Python作为接口连接和查询数据库。研究的目的是找到一种消耗更少资源和时间来获取结果的更好选择。研究结果表明，ESG的图数据库在整合ESG进入商业和投资中具有相对较好的性能。
tldr: 本研究评估了SQL、No-SQL和图数据库的效率和性能，并发现ESG的图数据库在整合ESG进入商业和投资中具有较好的性能。
en_tdlr: This research evaluated the efficiency and performance of SQL, No-SQL and graph databases and found that the graph database of ESG is comparatively better for integrating ESG in business and investment.
